node.title: Artificial Sun, Which Could Create Almost Limitless Clean Energy, Breaks Plasma Record
node.description: KSTAR, which aims to bring nuclear fusion down to Earth to meet humanity's clean energy needs, confined super-hot plasma for a record 30 seconds.

node.title: Texas Man Shot to Death in Walmart Parking Lot Before Thanksgiving
node.description: Police said the shooting happened while the store was still open.

node.title: The Detroit Lions Always Play on Thanksgiving, What's Their Holiday Record?
node.description: The last time they won a Thanksgiving game was in 2016 against the Minnesota Vikings 16-13.

node.title: Happy Thanksgiving!
node.description: And just remember: Everything’s going to be all right.

node.title: South Carolina Women’s Basketball Soars in Place, Atop the Rankings
node.description: The Gamecocks were already ranked No. 1 when they beat Connecticut, but the victory elevated a sense that Coach Dawn Staley is building a perennial title contender.

node.description: Readers respond to Ross Douthat’s column about new universities. Also: Fighting vaccine mandates in Florida; a view from Meta.

node.title: The French rush to get booster shots as the government eyes more restrictions.
node.description: The French health minister said the latest wave of cases would be worse than the one during the summer. Adults will need a booster for their health pass to remain valid.

node.title: North Korea Bans Leather Coats To Stop Citizens Emulating Kim's Fashion–Report
node.description: The coats are recognized in the hermit kingdom as "a symbol of power," a source told Radio Free Asia

node.title: Trump Promises 'Wonderful Future Lies Ahead' In Thanksgiving Message
node.description: In a statement released on Thursday, the former president described the holiday season as "a very interesting time in our Country."

node.title: Kariamu Welsh, Pioneer of African Dance Studies, Dies at 72
node.description: Inspired by double Dutch jump rope moves she saw growing up in Brooklyn, she developed an influential dance technique based on archetypes found in African art.
